attributes.action: Remove the planned restriction to Phoenix Way in Heston
attributes.additional_details: Hounslow Council do not learn from their mistakes. It is about time they listen to the people that live in the area and not just create more problems for people in the area. There are bigger issues in Hounslow other than Phoenix Way. They need to sort them out first.
attributes.background: Hounslow Council plans to put a restriction on access to Phoenix Way in Heston which will cause huge amount of traffic for residents around the area. They tried it once and it caused loads of traffic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Such access restriction is the responsibility of the council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:
http://petitions.hounslow.gov.uk/new
